name: Baked Chipotle Chicken Flautas
author: Mission Foods
summary: Spicy cooked chicken in a creamy sauce is rolled into tortillas, baked until golden brown, then served with sour cream, salsa, and cilantro.
ingredients: 2 cups diced cooked chicken breast meat
1 (10.75 ounce) can  reduced fat and sodium cream of chicken soup
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers, undrained
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F
Mix together chicken, cream of chicken soup, diced green chile peppers, 1 tsp
chipotle powder, cumin, and coriander in a medium size saucepan
Heat over medium heat until hot
Place about 3 tablespoons of the chicken filling along the edge of a tortilla
Roll the tortilla up more tight than loose
Put a toothpick through the middle of the flauta to hold in place
Place on a sprayed large baking sheet
In a small bowl mix together the canola oil and remaining ground chipotle pepper
Lightly brush the flautas with the oil mixture
Bake until golden brown, about 15 minutes
Remove toothpicks, slice each flautas on the diagonal
Transfer on your favorite fiesta platter, sprinkle with chopped fresh cilantro, serve with low fat sour cream and salsa
